segments.text: I can see the woman is so absorbed in her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She probably just wants to get through her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame she's missing all the trouble around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is a real problem, I'm concerned for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress will be soaked, not to mention the floor damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are completely taking advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool looks like he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to call out to her, to warn her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating situation to witness from afar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so peaceful, yet so unknowingly surrounded by hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be a rude awakening when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don't get hurt or make an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration is admirable, but her awareness is lacking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a bit heartbreaking to see such a dedicated person miss so much.
segments.speaker: PAR
